songs.title: In the City That Never Sleeps
songs.lyrics:
In the city that never sleeps
I sleep alone
In the city that never sleeps
I found my home
And never worry for the things
I have to say
And never worry for the things
I do it my way

In another part of the world
I can be free
In another part of the world
I can believe
And never worry for the things
I have to say
And never worry for the things
I do it my way

How do you thing Iâ€™m a crazy
When I can give you a morning sun?
How do you thing Iâ€™m lazy
She, you always break my heart again

In the city that never sleeps
I sleep alone
In another part of the wolrd
I found my home

And never worry for the things
I have to say
And never worry for the things
I do it my way

In the city that never sleeps
I sleep alone
In the city that never sleeps
I sleep alone
In the city that never sleeps
I sleep alone
